inclusion.criterion: Females at least 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Understand and voluntarily sign an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: English-speaking (able to read and understand English)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Undergoing total laparoscopic hysterectomy for benign indication
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Undergoing concomitant procedures in addition to hysterectomy which may cause urinary dysfunction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known history of pre-operative urinary incontinence or retention
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of prior bladder or prolapse surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Neurologic or spinal cord injury affecting bladder function
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is considering a laparoscopic gastric bypass, but has sleep apnea and PCO which may be relevant to her eligibility.
